00060   m_probeGc   = ProbeList::UNSET;
00061   m_probeApid = ProbeList::UNSET;
00062 }

00113 void
00114 ProbeListStlBlock::clear()
00115 {
00116   m_blockSize=0;
00117   //
00118   m_blockAnnotation=ProbeList::UNSET;
00119   m_blockAllele=ProbeList::UNSET;
00120   m_blockContext=ProbeList::UNSET;
00121   m_blockChannel=ProbeList::UNSET;
00122   m_blockRepType=ProbeList::UNSET;

00124 
00125 bool ProbeListStlBlock::matchACC(int qAllele,int qContext,int qChannel) const
00126 {
00127   if ((qAllele==m_blockAllele) &&
00128       (qContext==m_blockContext) &&
00129       (qChannel==m_blockChannel)) {
00130     return true;
00131   }
00132   return false;
00133 }

00159   clear();
00160   resize(block_cnt,probe_cnt);

00175 ProbeListStl& ProbeListStl::operator=(const ProbeListPacked& plp)
00176 {
00177   int b_cnt=plp.block_cnt();
00178   int p_cnt=plp.probe_cnt();
00179 
00180   //printf("operator= ----------\n");
00181 
00182   clear();
00183   reserve(b_cnt,p_cnt);
00184 
00185   //
00186   set_name(plp.get_name_string());
00187   set_type(plp.get_type());
00188   set_numMatch(plp.get_numMatch());
00189   //
00190   for (int b=0;b<b_cnt;b++) {
00191     push_block(plp.get_blockAnn(b),
00192                plp.get_blockAllele(b),
00193                plp.get_blockContext(b),
00194                plp.get_blockChannel(b),
00195                plp.get_blockRepType(b));
00196     set_blockSize(b,plp.get_blockSize(b));
00197   }
00198   // set the Apid of each probe as we copy it.
00199   // we know they are sequental from the block start.
00200   // this will save looking it up later.
00201   int apid=plp.getApidStart();
00202   APT_ERR_ASSERT(apid>=0,"");
00203 
00204   for (int p=0;p<p_cnt;p++) {
00205     push_probe(plp.get_probeId(p),plp.get_probeGc(p),apid++);
00206   }
00207 
00208   //printf("operator=\n");
00209   //plp.dump();
00210   //dump();
00211 
00212   return *this;
00213 }

00215 void ProbeListStl::resize(int block_cnt,int probe_cnt) {
00216   m_block_vec.resize(block_cnt);
00217   m_probe_vec.resize(probe_cnt);
00218 }
00219 void ProbeListStl::reserve(int block_cnt,int probe_cnt) {
00220   m_block_vec.reserve(block_cnt);
00221   m_probe_vec.reserve(probe_cnt);
00222 }

00224 void ProbeListStl::clear() {
00225   m_name="";
00226   m_max_name_len=1024; // the most we want to store.
00227   m_type=ProbeList::UNSET;
00228   m_num_match=0;
00229   //
00230   m_block_vec.resize(0);
00231   m_probe_vec.resize(0);
00232 }

00350 void ProbeListStl::push_block(const ProbeListStlBlock* b)
00351 {
00352   APT_ERR_ASSERT(b!=NULL,"Cant push back a null block.");
00353   m_block_vec.push_back(*b);
00354 }
00355 void ProbeListStl::push_block(int bAnn,int bAllele, int bContext, int bChannel, int bRepType)
00356 {
00357   m_block_vec.push_back(ProbeListStlBlock(bAnn,bAllele,bContext,bChannel,bRepType));
00358 }

00374 void ProbeListStl::push_probe(const ProbeListStlProbe& p)
00375 {
00376   m_probe_vec.push_back(p);
00377 }

00379 {
00380   m_probe_vec.push_back(ProbeListStlProbe(id));

00387 //
00388 void ProbeListStl::push_probelist(const ProbeListStl& pl)
00389 {
00390   for (int b=0;b<pl.block_cnt();b++) {
00391     m_block_vec.push_back(pl.m_block_vec[b]);
00392   }
00393   for (int p=0;p<pl.probe_cnt();p++) {
00394     m_probe_vec.push_back(pl.m_probe_vec[p]);
00395   }
00396 }
00397 
00398 const ProbeListStlBlock* ProbeListStl::getBlockPtr(int b)
00399 {
00400   if ((b<0)||(b>=m_block_vec.size())) {
00401     return NULL;
00402   }
00403   return &m_block_vec[b];
00404 }
00405 
00406 //
00407 int ProbeListStl::findBlockMatch(int qAllele,int qContext,int qChannel) const
00408 {
00409   for (int b=0;b<block_cnt();b++) {
00410     if ((qAllele==get_blockAllele(b)) &&
00411         (qContext==get_blockContext(b)) &&
00412         (qChannel==get_blockChannel(b))) {
00413       return b;
00414     }
00415   }
00416   return -1;
00417 }
00418 
00419 bool ProbeListStl::hasDuplicateBlocks() const
00420 {
00421   for (int b=0;b<block_cnt();b++) {
00422     int idx=findBlockMatch(get_blockAllele(b),get_blockContext(b),get_blockChannel(b));
00423     if (idx!=b) {
00424       return true;
00425     }
00426   }
00427   return false;
00428 }
00429     
00430 #define PLS_DUMP "#PLS: "
00431 // Handy method to display ourselves.
00432 void ProbeListStl::dump() const {
00433 
00434   int b_cnt=block_cnt();
00435   int p_cnt=probe_cnt();
00436   printf(PLS_DUMP "%p '%s' b_cnt=%d  p_cnt=%d\n",
00437          this,m_name.c_str(),b_cnt,p_cnt);
00438   //
00439   if (b_cnt>0) {
00440     printf(PLS_DUMP "Size____ Anno____ Allele__ Context_ Channel_ RepType_\n");
00441     for (int b=0;b<b_cnt;b++) {
00442       printf(PLS_DUMP "%8d %8d %8d %8d %8d %8d\n",
00443              get_blockSize(b),
00444              get_blockAnn(b),
00445              get_blockAllele(b),
00446              get_blockContext(b),
00447              get_blockChannel(b),
00448              get_blockRepType(b));
00449     }
00450   }
00451   //
00452   if (p_cnt>0) {
00453     printf(PLS_DUMP "ID______ GC APID____\n");
00454     for (int p=0;p<p_cnt;p++) {
00455       printf(PLS_DUMP "%8d %2d %8d\n",get_probeId(p),get_probeGc(p),get_probeApid(p));
00456     }
00457   }
00458 }
